text: Ivan Shanhin (; 19 August 1955) is a former professional Soviet football defender and coach. ==References == ==External links== * * Hadzheha, V. Ivan Shanhin: "My mom shooed me away from training, but I anyway became a footballer" (Іван ШАНГІН: «Мене мама з тренувань проганяла, а я все одно став футболістом»). Ukrayinskyi futbol. title: Ivan Shanhin
